Description: Here's a 2012 Gibson Custom Shop Reissue in a factory original and pretty rare Heritage Cherry finish with a factory sting on the back of the headstock. It is in excellent condition and looks like it's only been lightly played at home. The guitar is 100% all original. The finish on the top and back is clean - nearly perfect- see pics. There's a light clear coat scratch on the top near the bridge pickup - see pics. The hardwear and the pickups are original. No mods, repairs or funky odors. The neck is a 60's neck, and it is straight. The pickups are '57 Classic PAF Burstbucker #1 and #2 and the solder joints are untouched. It has a long neck tenon as well. She a little hot rod and only weighs 6.2 lbs. Comes with the Gibson Custom Shop hardshell case, COA and all other stuff you see in the pictures. This guitar will be safely packed and shipped. Buyer to pay $60 FedEx shipping anywhere in the U.S. Full insurance included in shipping. California residents please add 7.25% sales tax. Local San Diego pickup always welcome. Will ship worldwide. International shipping guidelines: Buyer is responsible for any import duties. We can declare a low value. FedEx Ground to Canada is $175 with full insurance. FedEx or USPS Express is $245 to most parts of Europe and the UK. FedEx is $295 to Asia and Australia. Full insurance available. Please call or email me if you have any questions - 858-531-2287
